name: moleskin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of strong cotton cloth with a surface that feels like very short hairs: moleskin trousers
US a soft thick material that you stick on your foot to prevent blisters (= sore raised areas where the skin has been rubbed): Don't forget to pack bandages, painkillers, and moleskin.
